basics.name: Jingyi He
basics.label: CS Graduate - Open to Opportunities
basics.summary: M.S. and B.S. in Computer Science (University of Hawai'i at Manoa). I build user-focused software across full-stack web (Next.js/TypeScript/MongoDB) and immersive XR experiences (Unity). Interested in roles spanning full-stack engineering and XR/AI-driven applications

highlights: Accomplished alignment of web pages with UI/UX designs by editing current page designs or creating new pages based on provided designs, resulting in a consistent and visually appealing user interface
Enhanced data accessibility for user-facing screens by modifying database schemas and backend functions to return required fields, resulting in complete and reliable page rendering
Reduced defects in released features by debugging issues through code reading, reproduction, and targeted fixes, resulting in improved stability and fewer regressions
Utilized: TypeScript, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Git/GitHub

work.summary: Teach and help students to gain a deeper understanding of concepts in Calculus 2.
highlights: Delivered feedback using positive reinforcement techniques to encourage, motivate and build confidence in students
Guided students in learning course content by referring to student class notes, assignments and class resource
Tutored students one-on-one to help during office hours

awards.title: Hawaii B Plus State Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
